  • Method Details

    • createFileStreams

      private static java.io.FileOutputStream[] createFileStreams​(java.lang.String sOutPath, java.lang.String sErrPath)
      Returns an array of FileOutputStreams to write the output to.

      This method will attempt to create file output streams to write the standard output streams to with the given filenames.

      If the file exists but is a directory rather than a regular file, does not exist but cannot be created, or cannot be opened for any other reason then the method will attempt to create the output streams at the default location instead.

      Parameters:
      sOutPath - The filename under which to write the System.out stream to.
      sErrPath - The filename under which to write the System.err stream to.
      Returns:
      The array of FileOutputStreams.
      See Also:
      defaultFileStreams()

    • defaultFileStreams

      private static java.io.FileOutputStream[] defaultFileStreams() throws java.io.UncheckedIOException
      Helper of createFileStreams(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to create output streams at the default location.

      Due to the requirements defined in the the assessment specification, the default file paths defined in Config cannot be edited. As such, exceptions arising from the creation of the fallback FileOutputStreams are treated as "unrecoverable" and will raise an unchecked exception as a result.

      Returns:
      The array of FileOutputStreams.
      Throws:
      java.io.UncheckedIOException - If an I/O error occurs; see above for more information.
      See Also:
      Config.getDefaultStdOutFilePath(), Config.getDefaultStdErrFilePath(), createFileStreams(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

    • stopLog

      @Deprecated public static void stopLog()
      Deprecated.
      Unused convenience method. Defined to allow compilation without editing Messenger.
